bookingLocationId.title: bookingLocationId
bookingLocationId.description: Optional booking location Id the user wants to get location information from. Use this to get the Name, Address, Timezone, location information or if the location is virtual. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.

country.title: country
country.description: Optional: The sanitised country Alpha 3 code the user provides to search for bookable locations.

productId.title: productId
productId.description: Optional: product2Id input if the user wants to search for locations with this product in stock. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.

state.title: state
state.description: Optional sanitised state code the user provides to search for bookable locations.

storeId.title: storeId
storeId.description: The storeId currently in use. This is an 18 character alphanumeric Id.
